RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Engenheira Ambiental e sanitсria, graduada pela Universidade de Taubatщ (UNITAU). Seus principais projetos e interesses estуo relacionados ao estudo da biogeoquэmica ambiental com ъnfase nas emissѕes de GEE?s de ecossistemas naturais e centros urbanos. Participou de projetos como bolsista junto ao Instituto de Pesquisas Espaciais (INPE) (2008-2012) em projetos como ?Avaliaчуo da Emissуo de VOC?s no Municэpio de Sуo Josщ dos Campos? e ?Emissуo de CO2 e N2O em cultivo de soja" e do perэodo (2012-2013) no estudo de emissѕes de GEE's do solo natural e modificado da caatinga no estado de Pernambuco.

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Centro de Ciъncias do sistema terrestre-CCST

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Determinaчуo das caracterэsticas quэmicas da atmosfera em diferentes ambientes no Estado de Sуo Paulo: estudo de espщcies reativas de nitrogъnio
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: A variaчуo da quantidade de nitrogъnio reativo presente nos diferentes ambientes terrestres estс intimamente ligada рs mudanчas ambientais, р contaminaчуo de ecossistemas aquсticos e terrestres e р perda de biodiversidade. O entendimento sobre a acumulaчуo de nitrogъnio reativo no ambiente depara-se ainda com grandes lacunas e questѕes como quanto o aumento da deposiчуo de nitrogъnio reativo pode interferir no funcionamento de diferentes ecossistemas ou como ocorre a interaчуo e o acoplamento do ciclo do nitrogъnio com os outros ciclos tais como o do C, S e P ainda precisam de resposta. Desta forma a questуo cientэfica que se apresenta refere-se р quantificaчуo da concentraчуo e da deposiчуo de espщcies quэmicas de nitrogъnio reativo nas formas, inorgтnica e orgтnica, presentes na atmosfera de algumas regiѕes do Estado de Sуo Paulo. Esta pesquisa buscarс determinar, a partir das medidas de concentraчуo de diferentes espщcies quэmicas, a deposiчуo atmosfщrica das mesmas, em alguns locais com diferentes ambientes no estado de Sуo Paulo viabilizando a utilizaчуo de um sistema de amostragem de baixo custo e com possibilidade de replicar o modelo estabelecido para outras regiѕes, estendo-se assim a сrea de observaчуo. Serуo determinadas as concentraчѕes em extrato aquoso das seguintes espщcies quэmicas gasosas: 〖NH〗_3, HNO_3, SO_2, HCl e no aerossol: NH_4^+, NO_3^-, SO_4^(2-), Cl^-, Na^+, Ca^(2+), Mg^(2+) presentes na atmosfera. Com os resultados desta pesquisa, espera-se que possamos contribuir com informaчѕes para avaliar a vulnerabilidade regional a eventuais mudanчas na deposiчуo de espщcies reativas de nitrogъnio, decorrentes de sua acumulaчуo e deposiчуo; identificar as possэveis mudanчas nos padrѕes de deposiчуo (caso ocorram) sobre os serviчos dos ecossistemas bem como contribuir para o entendimento da conexуo entre o componente atmosfщrico do ciclo do nitrogъnio e os ciclos do C e do S, e como essas alteraчѕes podem interferir no clima.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Determinaчуo das caracterэsticas quэmicas da atmosfera em diferentes ambientes no Estado de Sуo Paulo: estudo de espщcies reativas de nitrogъnio

FINANCIADOR-DO-PROJETO.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Fundaчуo de Amparo р Pesquisa do Estado de Sуo Paulo

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Centro de Ciъncias do sistema terrestre-CCST

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Nitrogen Cycling In Latin America: Drivers, Impacts And Vulnerabilities (Nnet)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: The lack of information on the nitrogen cycle in Latin America is a serious impediment to the ability to evaluate and project how human activity is altering nitrogen pools and turnover at regional and global scales. Empirical measurements of N deposition or processes are scarce and data lack spatial distribution information. This project will develop a Nitrogen Human Environment Network (Nnet) to examine human impact on natural and modified ecosystems across a wide range of climates. Direct measurements and regional modeling will contribute to a greater understanding of how nitrogen excess or shortage affect ecosystem processes and biodiversity. The project will review across several study sites distributed along regional precipitation gradients, and defined according to physiographic and socio-economic attributes, the following inputs: Natural-BNF and cultivation induced-BNF, fertilizer use, atmospheric deposition; and outputs: Net exports of agricultural products at regional level and estimates at site scale of gaseous emissions from land use (fertilizer volatilization, biogenic soil emissions and burning), export of N to groundwater and surface waste (domestic, agricultural and industrial). Local information will be scaled up by modeling regional-level nitrogen atmospheric deposition, atmospheric chemistry and transport. The regional modeling will feed to global models, enhancing understanding of global patterns of alterations to the nitrogen cycle. The social component will examine drivers of land use change and nitrogen utilization at local and regional levels analyzing the international and domestic forcing of those drivers (e.g., bioenergy, beef, soy production). The social and economical aspect will be examine through drivers of LUC and N use at local and regional levels, analyzing the domestic and international forcing of those drivers (e.g., bioenergy, beef, soy production). The analysis will be done through the creation of a Expert Group, which will be
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Nitrogen Cycling In Latin America: Drivers, Impacts And Vulnerabilities (Nnet)

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Impactos de mudanчas climсticas sobre a cobertura e uso da terra em Pernambuco: geraчуo e disponibilizaчуo de informaчѕes para o subsэdio a polэticas pњblicas
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O presente projeto propѕe atividades de pesquisa cientэfica e tecnolѓgica cooperativa entre instituiчѕes e pesquisadores de Sуo Paulo e de Pernambuco. O projeto inclui pesquisas sobre os impactos das mudanчas projetadas atщ o final do sщculo sobre os solos, vegetaчуo, e sistemas agropecuсrios em Pernambuco. As atividades envolvem tambщm o mapeamento e quantificaчуo dos estoques e fluxos de carbono em сreas sob diferentes usos e cobertura da terra, utilizando medidas in situ, sensoriamento remoto e modelagem matemсtica. Em todas as atividades serс dada ъnfase a identificaчуo de vulnerabilidades com o intuito de subsidiar polэticas pњblicas para a adoчуo de estratщgias de adaptaчуo рs mudanчas projetadas.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Projeto de Restauraчуo Ecolѓgica baseado no princэpio da nucleaчуo para recuperaчуo de Сreas de Preservaчуo Permanente (APP's)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto tem por finalidade a restauraчуo ecolѓgica da APP Rio Paraэba do Sul incidente na gleba atravщs da aplicaчуo de tщcnicas baseadas no principio da nucleaчуo. A proposta de implantaчуo e manutenчуo detalhadas nesse projeto щ apresentada visando o estabelecimento e aplicaчуo de medidas de recuperaчуo para a APP degradada. Serуo apresentados neste documento o levantamento da situaчуo atual da gleba e as aчѕes necessсrias para a recuperaчуo, de acordo com as caracterэsticas da vegetaчуo regional e a ocorrъncia de remanescentes arbѓreos no seu entorno.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Estudo das Emissѕes de гxido Nitroso em Cultivo de Soja
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: STUDY OF EMISSIONS OF NITROUS OXIDE ON THE CULTIVATION OF SOYBEAN

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: Seminсrio de Iniciaчуo Cientэfica do INPE-SICINPE

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This study aimed to provide measures of nitrous oxide (N2O) issued under soybean (Glycine max) using control (without fertilizer) using the bacterium Rizobium that aims to fix nitrogen from the atmosphere to the plant, preventing is required to nitrogen fertilization. The technique used for the cultivation of soy was the conventional one. This legume was adopted for the experiment because it has the property of fixing nitrogen from the air by bacteria that develop root nodules on the roots and nourishes the plant, a process known as nitrification. The importance of N2O due to its direct relation with global warming and the destruction of stratospheric ozone. Among the anthropogenic sources has been the growing incidence of N2O emission caused by nitrogenation soil in agricultural activities. The trial was conducted by the Department of Agricultural Sciences, University of Taubatщ (UNITAU) (23o01 'S and 45o30' W) in the period 06.10.2009 to 04.22.2010 with a total of 11 field campaigns. To determine the flow of N2O were used transparent acrylic chambers covering 0.25 square meters in plants chosen randomly. Syringes used in the experiment were made of polyurethane (60 mL) adapted with a safety valve that prevented gas exchange between the external environment and internal syringes. The sample collection was performed at intervals of 1, 10, 20, 30 and 40 minutes from the seal chamber. Nitrous oxide accumulated in the chambers was determined using the gas chromatography, using a gas chromatograph Shimadzu GC-14A equipped with electron capture detector (63Ni.) The variation of flow achieved in all campaigns was -100.45 to 172.35 g (N2O) m-2 h-1. During the experiment was a campaign by night, and can be observed that at night there was an N20 absorption by the plant with the flow ranging from -67.07 to 34.89 g (N2O) m-2 h-1, showing a average of -12.23 g (N2O) m-2 h-1. During the campaigns were observed large variations in flow due to high precipitation in summer months

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Avaliaчуo dos Efeitos do Reuso de Сguas de Esgotos sobre a Produtividade e a Qualidade Microbiolѓgica de Cultivares de Rabanete
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: EVALUATION OF THE EFEIROS OF IT I REUSE OF SEWER WATER ON THE PRODUCTIVITY AND THE MICROBIOLOGICAL QUALITY TO CULTIVATE OF RADISH

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: Encontro Nacional de Iniciaчуo Cientэfica- ENIC

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Сgua, esgoto, atividades de gestуo de resэduos e descontaminaчуo

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The water is a resource each scarcer time, either for the increase of the demand, either for the reduction of offers, the growth of the population, especially for the pollution of the spring. Consequently, it appears as alternative potential of rationalization, the reutilizaчуo of the water for some uses, also for irrigation. The benefits added in the practical one are several of reuse in the irrigation, including the recharge of the freсtico sheet and the fertirrigaчуo of diverse cultures, respecting the sanitary and ambient limits of application for guarantee of the quality level, although the possibility of the contamination risk, what it necessarily does not imply the certainty of transmission of illnesses its use for the radish culture, appears as a good alternative for the disposal of sewer waters. With the objective to study the effect I reuse of it of water of sewers on the productivity and microbiological quality in the radish culture (Raphanus sativus L.), installed this assay in the Department of Civil Engineering of the University of Taubatщ. Three treatments had been used each one with three seedbeds, being the first one irrigated with drinking waters, as with water of I duly reuse of sewer and the third with drinking waters and ground seasoning. One analyzes of comparative form the behavior on the productivity and microbiological quality of the difentes types of culture. The produtividades of the culture in the treatments irrigated with sewers and the microbiological quality of the water of I probably reuse had been inside of the tolerable limits.
